name: ext_R5_ObservationDefinition
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ObservationDefinition for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents ObservationDefinition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ObservationDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.
